alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Hanover (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 6:44PM EDT until May 27 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CAROLINE AND NORTHWESTERN HANOVER COUNTIES... At 643 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bumpass, or 13 miles northwest of Randolph Macon College, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Ladysmith around 705 PM EDT. Milford around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Chilesburg, Golansville, Coatesville, Hewlett, Mabelton, Penola, Noel, Beaverdam, Burruss Corner and Nancy Wrights Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
